summary: An escort girl gets the opportunity to inherit 6 million euros from a wealthy old and sick man by marrying him. Unfortunately things don't always go as planned.
cast: Rifka Lodeizen|Bastiaan Ragas|Sabrina van Halderen|Ton Kas|Tom Jansen|Kenan Raven|Eva van de Wijdeven|Pieter Van der Sman|Herman Bolten|Stef van der Eijnden|Ger Thijs|Maureen Teeuwen|Jimmy Antonius Roemer|Hans van Leipsig|Kees Boot|Job Raaijmakers|Ian Bok|Coby Timp|Jurg Molenaar|Dirk Marks
title: Escort
